title: So, on Act 1, we had swearing, a guy getting his leg flayed down to the bone, cold-blooded torture..
body: ...But giving Graves a Cigar? What are you thinking? Think of the children!

replies.body:
Yeah... I imagine the scenario will play out like this:

Timmy: Look mom! I'm playing as Gangplank!
Timmy's Hot Mom: What's a Gangplank, sweet-ums?
Timmy: Oh, he's just a pirate with a long beard with a gun. I wanna dress up as him for Halloween!
Timmy's Hot Mom: Oh that's great dear. 
Timmy: GP also flays people alive to carve his mark directly into their bones.
Timmy: He also lets the whooole ship hear the screams so they never would think of double crossing him.
Timmy's Hot Mom: That's nice dear.
Timmy: And his worst enemy is this guy named Graves who smokes wit cigarwettes.
Timmy's Hot Mom: ...
Timmy's Hot Mom: ...
Timmy's Hot Mom: ...
Timmy's Hot Mom: WHO IS THE REAL MONSTER?
Hahahahhaha. I almost spit out my coffee reading this one.

Thanks for the responding with **zero** actual information regarding the the OP's question Rioter.

Very informative /sarcasm.

It isn't even funny. Just stupid.
Their question was answered when Graves lost his cigar, and has been reiterated several times since.

Actually, if you look at the comments you'll see that the question wasn't actually answered definitevily. 

I'm sorry DrCyanide, but you are incorrect.

I've answered it myself a dozen times in different threads, and I'm not the only one.

The key points from that initial discussion about Graves not having a cigar:

* League cannot have a cigar as part of their "core" game.
* At the time this was explained, Riot specifically explained that this did not relate to content outside the game. Thus, "A New Dawn" didn't have to be taken down or remade.

Those alone answer your question. The lore is not part of the core game, so it's not under the same constraints. If you want lore to be under the same constraints, then the cigar needs to be removed from "A New Dawn" as well.

I just don't get what the problem with it is. Was I REALLY the only one with an uncle that would let me hold the light while he carved curse words into a living person's bones and put his cigarette out on their forehead when he finished? I'm starting to get concerned.
meanwhile Esq Gragas still has his

Oh for christs sake, he was hiding you dunce; you don't smoke when you're trying to sneak/not be seen, or when you're freaking swimming. RIOT FINALLY GAVE US GOOD LORE, PLAY NICE

I was referencing how the cigar was edited out of his splash art for moral reasons.

I mean, I like this lore, it's good, I'm just making a sardonic observation.
Wasn't for moral reasons, but for legal reasons with other countries.

Presenting a cigar in cool-factor promotional material could encourage kids to smoke, and is illegal in some places because smoking is a problem there. Torture in non-promo, non visual content isn't likely to encourage kids to start carving people's bones out. There's perfectly good reasons for opting not to have a cigar on his splash, It's a stupid thing to make a fuss about.
